name: Dwaraka Organic - Curry Powder Hot, 7oz, Healthy, Organic, Non GMO, All Natural
short_description: Curry powder is a blend of organic Indian spices mixed in accurate proportion and ground into a fine powder to give Indian curries an authentic and balanced flavor.
Some of the spices used in the curry powder include turmeric, black peppercorns, mustard, cloves, dried ginger, and more.
All ingredients needed to make the hot curry powder are grown in a perfectly natural environment at Dwaraka Organic

This curry powder gives depth to any Indian preparation. It is used to prepare vegetarian and non-vegetarian delights. It is sometimes also used in marinades for the extra hint of spice. Its spicy flavor and rich aroma make the food extra hot and delicious.
Organic, Non-GMO, Chemical Free

name: Simply Organic Certified Organic Curry Powder, 3-Ounce 3-Pack, Aromatic Blend 11 Indian Cooking Spice for Meat, Seafood, Tofu
short_description: Curry Powder - This vibrant blend of organic spices, including turmeric, cumin, and coriander, adds a rich, earthy flavor with a touch of warmth to any dish.
Best uses - Perfect for curries, soups, roasted vegetables, and marinades, this versatile spice mix enhances your meals with a complex, aromatic flavor profile.
Grown for something greater - Simply Organic works directly with sourcing partners whenever possible, paying fair prices directly to them, without a middleman, to maximize the grower's return.
Organic Bottled Spices - Elevate your dishes with Simply Organic Bottled Spices, where the pure, delicious flavor of our spices and seasonings bring the goodness of organics to everyday meals.
About us - We are Simply Organic. The original, all-organic spice brand that lives up to the promise of our name in all we cultivate and bring to the table.
product_description: Simply Organic Curry Powder is an aromatic blend of 11 robust spices including coriander, turmeric, fenugreek and mustard. It is used primarily for highlighting the savory flavors of Indian cooking. In India, cooks choose from a selection of just-the-right spices to create each individual curry blend. You can do the same, when inspired and time permits. But you can also rely on curry powder to create authentic Indian fare any time.
